thread.title: U.S. Oil-Rig Count Rises for Fifth Consecutive Week
thread.title_full: U.S. Oil-Rig Count Rises for Fifth Consecutive Week - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: U.S. Oil-Rig Count Rises for Fifth Consecutive Week
text:
The U.S. oil-rig count increased by two in the latest week to 674, marking the fifth consecutive week of increases, according to Baker Hughes Inc.
The number of U.S. oil-drilling rigs, which is a proxy for activity in the oil industry, has fallen sharply since oil prices headed south last year. The rig count dropped for 29 straight weeks before... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
